definition: to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: This policy brief is an attempt to put concerns relating to potential allergenicity into perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本篇政策摘要将透视对潜在过敏性的担忧。

sentences.english: You can enter the Summary first to avoid the warning if you prefer.
sentences.chinese: 如果您愿意，您可以先进入摘要以避免产生警告。

sentences.english: Start with an executive summary, based on what you know about the TIMS project so far.
sentences.chinese: 开始执行摘要，根据您迄今了解的TIMS的项目。

sentences.english: Objective to improve the coating material of wuji baifeng pills.
sentences.chinese: 摘要目的对乌鸡白凤丸包衣材料进行改进。

sentences.english: Now everything above the bar is a summary, or preview, of the article.
sentences.chinese: 现在栏上的内容只有一个文章摘要，或预览。

sentences.english: It is a great political event in initial stage of the tang dynasty to abolish and set up the queen.
sentences.chinese: 摘要废立皇后是唐朝初期的一个重大政治事件。

sentences.english: This history book has a summary at the end of each chapter.
sentences.chinese: 这本历史书在每章之后都有一个摘要。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT The cost of capital is one of the most important factors in making decision of re-raising capital for all marketed companies.
sentences.chinese: 论文摘要融资成本是上市公司融资决策的重要依据。

sentences.english: The term "fluvial incision" refers to vertical incision of stream channel into bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 摘要流水下切是指河流河道在基岩中的垂直切割。

sentences.english: The modified coal tar pitches behaves in non-Newton fluid.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，改性煤沥青摘要表现出非牛顿流体行为。

sentences.english: Fournier's gangrene is a rare but often fatal manifestation of rectal cancer.
sentences.chinese: 摘要福尼耳坏疽在直肠癌病患很少见却经常致命。

sentences.english: Technology and market together impel the telecommunication industry to implement leap - forward development.
sentences.chinese: 摘要技术和市场共同推动了信息产业的跨越式发展。

sentences.english: Video abstraction are composed of the shot key fames according to the time order.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于交互信息量的视频摘要生成方法。

sentences.english: The temperature of carbonyl synthesis reaction is studied.
sentences.chinese: 摘要对羰基合成反应的温度进行了研究。

sentences.english: The concrete-abstract continuum is explore in later chapters . The concrete-abstract continuum is explained .
sentences.chinese: 具体的连续性摘要也会在较后的章中研究，还有解释。

definition: guide (e.g. book or other printed material)
to sum up/a roundup/a general narrative
to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
